text:
Nykaa is India's most
preferred online shopping
destination for lifestyle categories.
We are an omni-channel retailer,

and 90% of our revenue comes
from our e-commerce business.
And most of our e-commerce

platforms are hosted
within AWS infrastructure.

AWS is the most trusted
partner when it comes
to managing our clouds.
So very recently,

we have done product description
generation automation

with the help of Amazon
Bedrock. It is going

to standardize most of our
catalog descriptions in a way

that our customers will
find them more compelling
and more comprehensive,

and it is going to help
them make better decisions.
So for our customers, it is going

to improve their hyper-personalized
discovery experience.
They are going to find

their journeys a lot more
personalized and easier.
ML model accuracy has gone up from 50%
to all the way higher nineties,

and that has helped us gain
this confidence in a production

environment and we can generate
these product descriptions

with the help of product
attributes, which are coming out
of these deep learning models.
